ygData.subject: Re: Crafted Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: David, I have completed the Crafted Greaves quest twice now. You need the Dark Circlet and two Star Rubies. You take these items to Ulan a Centaur in the
ygData.messageBody:
David,

I have completed the Crafted Greaves quest twice now. You need the Dark
Circlet and two Star Rubies. You take these items to Ulan a Centaur in the
Centaur Village of South Karana. The /loc on the Centaur Village is 200,
-2400. I always Hail him and ask him about the item I want him to make
before I turn over the quest items to him. I keep my number one inventory
slot clear and do not stack the gems. This may be a bit anal but I want to
make sure not to lose anything, and never have doing it this way.

Good Luck!

Royal Fire
Dwarven Paladin of the 30th Order

On Fri, 10 Sep 1999, Whitcraft,David wrote:
>From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>>
>Who has actually DONE the Crafted Greaves quest? I've heard different
>stories on what item you need. Some say the Silver Circlet off Drelzna,
>some
>say a circlet off Najena, and some say one off Trazdon.>
>I killed Trazdon in Najena last night at got a Dark Circlet (LORE NO DROP
>MAGIC ITEM) Necro Only, AC 4, -2 CHA, +4 INT. Is this the correct item
>(please only if you have 1st hand knowledge...) It could be a Circlet from
>any of them could work....but I dont' wanna take the chance as there is a
>couple hours of work (plus two deaths...growl...I hadden't died in 6 ot 7
>levels) and 140pp in rubies at stake...heh.>
>And if this ISN'T the correct circlet, what's this head peice worth?
>*chuckle*> Thanks.
